content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To make the assignment process more convenient, APortal lets you create Assigning rules configuration. It is very useful when a CA should be assigned to a group of users that can be grouped by a common feature, for instance Job Function, Project, Customer, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Assigning rules configuration\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Assigning rules allows configuring a list of conditions when the corporate assignment should be assigned to the user. Configured rules are grouped by rule sets. For the user to receive the assignment, the user should correspond to at least one rule set.\\nWithin a rule set, all rules are joined by the logic operator AND. Corporate assignments can be assigned to the user automatically if all rules listed in rules set are met.\\nTo start configuring rule set, click Add rule set:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/363b5bae-c921-4b07-b5a1-bf3ba22b2be2/ruleset.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":675,\"height\":162}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There
